definition: Tang Bohu or Tang Yin 唐寅 (1470-1523), Ming painter and poet, one of Four great southern talents of the Ming 江南四大才子
Tang dynasty (618-907)/surname Tang
to exaggerate/empty/in vain/old variant of 螗[tang2]
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
one hundred (old)
variant of 霸[ba4]
tiger/CL:隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: But it's hard to imitate the painting of Tong Pak Fu!
sentences.chinese: 可是唐伯虎的畫意境那麼高，我又怎麼能模仿得來呢？

sentences.english: This is the painting by Tong Pak Fu.
sentences.chinese: 這幅纔是唐伯虎的真跡，皇爺。

sentences.english: I met this guy in the market, he claimed himself to be Tong Pak Fu.
sentences.chinese: 夫人，我在蘇州市集看到這個人自認是唐伯虎。

sentences.english: Ton Pak Fu, don't let us down.
sentences.chinese: 唐伯虎，不要枉費我們的一番心血。

sentences.english: If Tong Pak Fu had a friend like you, he wouldn't have any regrets.
sentences.chinese: 如果唐伯虎能夠有你這位紅顏知己，真是死而無憾呀。

sentences.english: I have got the painting of Tong Pak Fu.
sentences.chinese: 我終於搶到唐伯虎的墨寶了。

sentences.english: I want him to identify him enemy Tong Pak Fu.
sentences.chinese: 讓他當面認一下，他不共戴天的仇人唐伯虎。

sentences.english: Snowster on the Surge in love at first sight Maoruo angel.
sentences.chinese: 唐伯虎對貌若天仙的秋香一見鍾情。

sentences.english: I know, you must know Tong Pak Fu.
sentences.chinese: 你以爲我不知道，你一定認識唐伯虎吧。

sentences.english: How can we have the 'Spring and Autumn' drawn by Tong Pak Fu?
sentences.chinese: 華府怎麼會有唐伯虎的春樹秋霜圖呢？

sentences.english: Tong Pak Fu, draw it now.
Tong Pak Fu is disgusting to make me jump for few days.
sentences.chinese: 唐伯虎真是可惡，害我白白跳了幾天。

sentences.english: Tang Bohu, or Tang Yin, a Chinese scholar and painter in Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 唐伯虎，名唐寅，明代的畫家，學者。

Tang Bohu 唐伯虎 or Tang Yin (1470-1523), Ming painter and poet, one of Four great southern talents of the Ming 江南四大才子
Xu Wei, Chinese painter

Four great southern talents of the Ming, namely: Tang Bohu 唐伯虎, Zhu Zhishan 祝枝山, Wen Zhengming 文徵明|文征明 and Xu Zhenqing 徐禎卿|徐祯卿

definition: Xu Zhenqing (1479-1511), Ming writer, one of Four great southern talents of the Ming 江南四大才子
Wen Zhengming (1470-1559), Ming painter, one of Four great southern talents of the Ming 江南四大才子
Zhu Yunming (1460-1526), Ming dynasty calligrapher
Liu Yong (987-1053), Song poet
Su Dongpo, another name for Su Shi 蘇軾|苏轼 (1037-1101), northern Song writer and calligrapher
Yuan Mei (1716-1798), famous Qing poet and critic, one of Three great poets of the Qianlong era 乾嘉三大家

Su Shi (1037-1101), also known as Su Dongpo 蘇東坡|苏东坡[Su1 Dong1 po1] northern Song Dynasty writer and calligrapher/one of the Three Su father and sons 三蘇|三苏[San1 Su1] and one of the Eight Giants of Tang and Song Prose 唐宋八大家[Tang2 Song4 Ba1 Da4 jia1]
Wu Jingzi (1701-1754), Qing dynasty novelist, author of The Scholars 儒林外史[Ru2 lin2 Wai4 shi3]
Huang Tingjian (1045-1105), Song poet and calligrapher
